#Text=Wikinews interviews Spanish Paralympic track and field athlete David Casinos
#Text=Friday , July 19 , 2013
#Text=Laura Hale interviews David Casinos for Wikinews
#Text=David Casinos at the airport in Madrid before departing for France
#Text=Image : Laura Hale .

#Text=With the IPC Athletics World Championships scheduled to start Friday ( today ) , Wikinews interviewed Spanish athlete David Casinos at Madrid – Barajas Airport Monday before he departed for Lyon , France .
#Text=( ( Wikinews ) )
#Text=Hello I 'm interviewing David Casinos , Spain 's most famous track and field athlete in Paralympic sport , for Wikinews .
#Text=So you 're competing at the IPC World Championships are going to win a whole lot of medals ?
#Text=Which medals are you going to win ?
#Text=David Casinos :
#Text=Well , I 'd like above all to perform well , because it would mean I 'd be closer to the medals .
#Text=I 'm humble in that sense .
#Text=( ( es))Spanish language :
#Text=‍Bueno , me gustaría sobre todo , primero hacerlo bien , eso significaría que voy a acercarme a esas medallas .
#Text=Soy muy humilde en ese aspecto .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=As somebody who 's been competing a long time in track and field , how has stuff changed form when you first started out to now ?
#Text=David Casinos : The biggest change I 've seen has been with regards to media , communication , but above all the Plan ADO Paralympic .
#Text=The professionalization of Plan ADO , becoming professional sportspeople .
#Text=Spanish Paralympic sports is now more known to the media and in the world .
#Text=( ( es))Spanish language :
#Text=‍El mayor cambio que he vivido yo ha sido la comunicación , pero sobre todo el Plan ADO Paralímpico .
#Text=Profesionalizar el Plan ADO .
#Text=Ser deportistas profesionales .
#Text=El deporte paralímpico español es más conocido ahora por los medios de comunicación y en el mundo entero .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=Have there been more opportunities for sponsorship as your Paralympics profile has grown ?
#Text=David Casinos :
#Text=Yes !
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=Would you like to promote a few of them ?

#Text=David Casinos : I 've got several sponsors , one of them is Toro Loco , an energy drink , there 's also Diputación de Valencia , Fundación Trinidad Alfonso , from Juan Roig , Mercadona , Moncada which is my townhall , Valencia Terra i Mar ...
#Text=I may be forgetting one of them now .
#Text=I 've got several .

#Text=( ( es))Spanish language : ‍Tengo bastantes patrocinadores , uno de ellos es Toro Loco , una bebida energética , Diputación de Valencia , Fundación Trinidad Alfonso , que es de Juan Roig , Mercadona , Moncada , mi ayuntamiento , Valencia Terra i Mar ...
#Text=Igual me olvido de alguno ahora .
#Text=Tengo varios .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=In London
#Text=one of the Australians said that it was time for athletics in the Paralympics to be able to become more professional and get shoe sponsorship .
#Text=Do you know if any of the Spanish ones are covering shoe logos if they do n't have sponsorship ?
#Text=[ Editor 's note : here the translator asked a different question in Spanish , about whether shoe brands were helping athletes . ]
#Text=( ( es))Spanish language :
#Text=‍Resulta que los australianos han hecho que los patrocinadores patrocinen sus zapatos .
#Text=¿ Esto pasa en los atletas españoles también ?
#Text=David Casinos :
#Text=No. This does not happen .
#Text=( ( es))Spanish language :
#Text=‍No .
#Text=No sucede .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=Is this going to be an issue ?
#Text=I mean is Spain at the level where it can become an issue ?
#Text=David Casinos : I for example have a big sponsor , Italian Macron Sports , which also sponsors the Italian and Spanish Leagues of soccer .
#Text=So I do n't have that problem .
#Text=I feel very supported .
#Text=( ( es))Spanish language :
#Text=‍Yo por ejemplo tengo un patrocinador muy grande , se llama Macrón Sports , italiano , y es patrocinador de la liga italiana , la española , de fútbol , y yo tengo su patrocinador .
#Text=Yo no tengo ese problema .
#Text=Me siento muy arropado .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=Okay .
#Text=So , you 're a visual-impaired athlete , and do you run with a guide ?
#Text=David Casinos : I do n't run with one , but I do need a guide to do series , jump , to do everything I need to do in training to throw very far .
#Text=( ( es))Spanish language : ‍No corro con un guía , pero sí necesito a ese guía para hacer series , saltar , hacer todo lo que tengo que hacer , para lanzar lejos .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=How helpful are guides in terms of how much they potentially impact outcomes , do you think ?
#Text=David Casinos : For me the guide is a basic component of my daily work .

#Text=When competing , they simply help you to get in and out of the field , and you do the rest , but in a daily basis what I call the backstage , the guide helps you with the weights , jumps , positions .
#Text=There 's more work even , behind the competition scenes .
#Text=( ( es))Spanish language : ‍Para mi el guía es una pieza fundamental en mi día a día .

#Text=En la competición simplemente te ayudan a entrar y salir del círculo , lo demás lo haces tú , pero en el día a día , en el backstage que le digo yo , es el que te ayuda con las pesas , a saltar , acolocarte en el foso , hay más trabajo incluso , detrás de la competición .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=Spain has a long history of blind sports , compared to other countries .
#Text=Do you have an explanation as to why there are so many blind athletes ?
#Text=David Casinos :
#Text=Well , above all we have ONCE , the organization greatly responsible for disabled people having available a series of options , including sports .
#Text=And in that respect ONCE has been very pioneering .
#Text=Absolutely pioneering .
#Text=And that 's good .
#Text=What 's happening now is that other countries are discovering their Paralympians .
#Text=( ( es))Spanish language :
#Text=‍Bueno , en primer lugar tenemos la organización ONCE , que es la gran precursora de que las personas con discapacidad tengamos una serie de opciones , entre ellas el deporte .
#Text=Y en ese aspecto ha sido la ONCE muy pionera .
#Text=Pioneros absolutos .
#Text=Y eso es bueno .
#Text=Lo que pasa es que ahora otros países están descubriendo sus paralímpicos .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=Is there anything you think an international audience should know about you or the Paralympic movement in Spain ?
#Text=David Casinos : I 'm just another sportsperson who fights for his dream , which is sports , to surpass myself , day after day , after having a great challenge which was losing my sight .
#Text=And that is the message I like to transmit to people through coaching .
#Text=( ( es))Spanish language : ‍Soy un deportista más , que lucha por mi sueño , que es el deporte , superarme , día a día , después de una gran dificultad que ha sido perder la visión .
#Text=Y este mensaje es el que me gusta transmitir a muchas personas mediante el coaching .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=Okay .
#Text=¡ Muchas gracias !
#Text=David Casinos :
#Text=Okay !
